alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Panola (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 3:47PM CST until December 09 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lafayette County in northwestern Mississippi... Southern Panola County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 430 PM CST. * At 346 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Batesville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oxford, Batesville, Water Valley, Holly Springs National Forest, Pope, Cambridge, Springdale, Burgess, Tula, Denmark, Paris, Courtland, Abbeville, Taylor, Toccopola, Keel, Delay, Asa, College Hill Station, and College Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northwestern Mississippi.
